widget.name: i Stretch $
widget.description:
i track where i get the best price for the items i buy regularly.
to compare price i can input size and unit of measure for an item to see the price per unit. for example, to understand the value of a small bottle as compared large bottle of juice, i can input a row for the 12 oz bottle priced at $2.40 and another row for the gal at $6.40. i can then see that the 12 oz bottle costs $.20/per oz, while the gallon is only $.10/per oz. if i drink a lot of orange juice, buying gallons will really stretch my dollars!
i choose. i compare. i stretch dollars.
widget.author: Linton Hale
